title: ANSI Viewer
name: ansi-viewer
description: View ANSI file in the browser
author: eight04 <eight04@gmail.com>

scripts.build-lib: browserify -r bbs-reader -r uao-js --exclude **/uao-js/table/** | n-pipe background/lib.js && browserify -r pmore | n-pipe public/pmore.js && n-copy -s node_modules/bbs-reader -d public bbs-reader.css && n-copy -s node_modules/uao-js/table -d background b2u.json
scripts.build-polyfill: pushd node_modules/webextension-polyfill && npm install && npm run build && popd && n-copy -s node_modules/webextension-polyfill/dist -d polyfill browser-polyfill.js
